div.head:
Embleme 24. Of the Secrets of Nature.
A wolfe devoured the King, and being burned restored him to life againe.

lg.l: Take the rapacious wolfe, and let him feast
His hungry stomackestomach on the King deceasddeceased:
Let Vulcan then blow up a fire, that hee
By th'the flames to ashes may reduced be;
Repeat this method, which at length will bring
Life and a LyonsLions courage to the King.
